detailed_rules.rule_text: Assign codes for perinatal conditions that require treatment or further investigation (Evidence: pg no: 73, L39)
detailed_rules.explanation: Any perinatal condition that necessitates active treatment or additional diagnostic workup should be coded (Evidence: pg no: 73, L39)
common_applications: Hypoglycemia requiring glucose monitoring and treatment

detailed_rules.rule_text: Assign codes for conditions that prolong length of stay or require resource utilization (Evidence: pg no: 73, L40)
detailed_rules.explanation: Conditions that impact hospital resources or extend the typical newborn stay should be coded even if minimal treatment is required (Evidence: pg no: 73, L40)

workflow_steps: Step 1: Identify all perinatal conditions documented
Step 2: Determine if condition requires treatment
Step 3: Assess if further investigation is needed
Step 4: Evaluate impact on length of stay or resources
Step 5: Assign codes for qualifying conditions
